channel.title: Someone threw a lolipop at my bus driver (FML)
channel.description:
Today I was riding home from school on the bus and the bus driver said something that someone threw a lolipop at her, and she was going back to school if no one admitted to doing it. So no one admitted and we went back to school. The 2 administrators came on the bus and started to ask questions like "Who did it?" and "Admit it NOW!", etc... No one admitted again, so apparently now the police is going to get involved, state trooper people, etc... And now I was 20 mins late.
FML.
EDIT: Discuss.

item.title: Someone threw a lolipop at my bus driver (FML)
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

This thread has gotten way out of control. I would give you all another chance to keep this thread open, but I know that closing it is what you want and that you will all more than likely spam like hell until I do. So ya.

Read full topic

item.title: Someone threw a lolipop at my bus driver (FML)
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:32, topic:312468”][quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=408865.msg3018678#msg3018678 date=1257424543]

Flaming doesn’t make you any cooler. So stop please.

Finally, thank you.

He was talking to everyone. I don’t flame to be cool, because otherwise I would flame everyone. I flame you in particular because you are an idiot that flames me as well. AND takes pride in leeching other people work.

And you take pride in flaming others. Whether it be for a good reason or not, you’re only subduing to equal ignorance. Why stoop down to contradict yourself? You’re form of justice doesn’t make a whole lot of sense =\

Btw, take “leeching” out of your lexicon. It’s used so lightly that it’s value means nothing.
[/quote]
If I took pride in flaming others, I would flame you right now for dissagreeing with me. Instead I will expain how you wrong in your assumption. Ignorance would be a point of view, seeing as how you don’t know what Pk3r has done for me to flame him like I do. He broke the rules two times for the same thing.

And leeching wasn’t what I meant, but I used it because I couldn’t thing of an appropriate word for what he did.[/quote]
So just settle the dispute via PM rather than being obnoxious on numerous threads.

Read full topic

item.title: Someone threw a lolipop at my bus driver (FML)
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

pk3r john:

Today I was riding home from school on the bus and the bus driver said something that someone threw a lolipop at her, and she was going back to school if no one admitted to doing it. So no one admitted and we went back to school. The 2 administrators came on the bus and started to ask questions like “Who did it?” and “Admit it NOW!”, etc… No one admitted again, so apparently now the police is going to get involved, state trooper people, etc… And now I was 20 mins late.

Today I was driving these douche bag kids from school till some dick threw a lolipop at me… and I said if no one admitted to doing it I’d go back to school. So no of these faggots admited it so we went back to school. And I called up 2 of the administrators and they’re like “WHO DID IT???” and like “ADMIT IT NOW!”, etc… No one admitted again, so I decided to place charges. and those state trooper niggers. etc… And those faggot kids were 20 minutes late.

Read full topic
